item.description:
There have been requests for more informal meetings such as meeting for dinner or an outing.

After much discussion it was decided Kimball's Farm, in Westford and Saturday, Aug 25 would be a good place and time.  We can meet for lunch at around 1pm.

Kimball's has food but you may also be able to bring your own. There is place to sit, eat, and talk as well as much to do like miniature golf, RC boat racing, a gift shop, and more.

Let's get together and get to know each other.

 

Kevin

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: NLP and Hypnosis Outing - Kimball's Farm
